
# The database

## Arches-powered platform

::: {.panel-tabset}

### Graph database

<img src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/app-arches.png' style='height: 35px;vertical-align: middle;'> is a web-based, geospatial information system for Cultural Heritage management

```{=html}
<embed src="https://www.archesproject.org/" width="1400px" height="400px" />
```


### CIDOC-CRM

<img src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/app-arches.png' style='height: 35px;vertical-align: middle;'> natively integrates the CIDOC-CRM[^1]

```{=html}
<embed src="https://eamena-project.github.io/eamena-arches-dev/data/lod/palmyra-cidoc-graph.html" width="1400px" height="600px" />
```

### Built-in Iso Standards

DCMI (<span style="color:grey">ISO 15836</span>) <img src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/lod-iso-dublin.png' style='height: 35px;vertical-align: middle;'>[^2]

SKOS (<span style="color:grey">ISO 25964-1</span>) <img src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/lod-iso-skos.png' style='height: 35px;vertical-align: middle;'>[^3]

SPARQL (<span style="color:grey">ISO/IEC 9075-15</span>)<img src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/lod-iso-sparql.png' style='height: 35px;vertical-align: middle;'>[^4]

IIIF (<span style="color:grey">ISO 21127</span>) <img src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/lod-iso-iiif.png' style='height: 35px;vertical-align: middle;'>[^5]

EDTF (<span style="color:grey">ISO 8601-2</span>)[^6]

WGS84 (<span style="color:grey">ISO 19111</span>)[^7]


[^1]: CIDOC Conceptual Reference Model <https://www.cidoc-crm.org/>
[^2]: Dublin Core Metadata Initiative <https://www.dublincore.org/>
[^3]: Simple Knowledge Organisation System <https://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/>
[^4]: Sparse Query Language <https://www.w3.org/TR/rdf-sparql-query/>
[^5]: International Image Interoperability Framework <https://iiif.io/>
[^6]: Extended Date/Time Format <https://www.loc.gov/standards/datetime/>
[^7]: World Geodetic System 1984 <https://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/>

:::

### Apache

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="40%"}

```{=html}
<embed src="https://eamena-project.github.io/eamena-arches-dev/it/arches-stack-16.html" width="800px" height="340px" />
```

EAMENA uses an <img src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/app-apache.png' style='height: 35px;vertical-align: middle;'> HTTP server

:::

::: {.column width="60%"}

```{.apache}
<VirtualHost *:80>

	ServerAdmin ash.smith@soton.ac.uk

	DocumentRoot /opt/arches/eamena

	ErrorLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/error.log
	CustomLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/access.log combined

	RewriteEngine On

	RewriteCond %{HTTPS} !on
	RewriteRule (.*) https://%{HTTP_HOST}%{REQUEST_URI} [L,R=301]

	Alias /static /opt/arches/eamena/eamena/static/
	Alias /media /opt/arches/media

	<Directory /opt/arches/eamena/eamena/static>
		Require all granted
	</Directory>
	<Directory /opt/arches/media>
		Require all granted
	</Directory>

	<Directory /opt/arches/eamena>

		<Files wsgi.py>
			Require all granted
		</Files>

	</Directory>

	WSGIDaemonProcess eamena user=arches python-path=/opt/arches/eamena python-home=/opt/arches/ENV
	WSGIProcessGroup eamena
	WSGIScriptAlias / /opt/arches/eamena/eamena/wsgi.py
	WSGIPassAuthorization on
	
	ProxyPreserveHost On
	ProxyPass "/geoserver" "http://54.155.109.226:8080/geoserver/"
	ProxyPassReverse "/geoserver" "http://54.155.109.226:8080/geoserver/"

</VirtualHost>
```


:::

::: {.notes}
Arches is a geospatial semantic graph platform for CH management. It natively integrates Dublin Core, CIDOC-CRM, SKOS and SPARQL. Its next version (v7) will also offer internationalisation, RTL support for the user interface and import/export of multi-language data.
:::
